participant_1.background:
I do not want kids.
I live in new york and work as a model.
I am single.
I also like to sing.

participant_2.background:
I have three grown children and six grandchildren.
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
I have two dogs and one cat.
I love to ride my bike.
I love caring for people.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
I'm participant_1. I'm a model from New York City. I don't want kids and I love to sing. What about you?
I'm participant_2. I'm a nurse's aide at a nursing home. I have three grown children and six grandchildren. I love to ride my bike and I love caring for people.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I also love to ride my bike and I love caring for people.
That's great! We should get to know each other better.
I'd love that.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the movies, go out to eat, and hang out with my friends.
Those are all great things to do. I love to go to the movies too.
Me too. I love to see all the new releases.
I'm more of a classic movie person. I love old movies like Casablanca and The Wizard of Oz.
I like those movies too! I also like newer movies like The Shawshank Redemption and The Green Mile.
Those are both great movies. I'm glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too. It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
I agree. So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go out with friends or go to the movies.
If you go to the movies, we should go together.
That would be fun! I'll let you know what I decide.
Okay, great! I'm free any time this weekend.
Thanks for chatting with me, participant_1. It was nice to meet you.
You too, participant_2. I hope we can get together again soon.
